sources.title: OutpostInMorocco
sources.description: "A melodrama about the heroics of a captain in the Foreign Legion" (George Raft). Filmed in North Africa.

sources.title: Outpost in Morocco (1949) GEORGE RAFTüçï MARIE WINDSOR
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: George Raft, Marie Windsor, Akim Tamiroff
Director: Robert Florey

A Foreign Legion officer (George Raft) is tasked with defending his garrison against the relentless forces of a native Emir. In an agonizing twist‚Äîthe enemy leader is the father of the woman he loves (Marie Windsor). 

TRIVIA: In 1946, George Raft seized creative control of his career by founding Star Films Inc. with producer Sam Bischoff. "Outpost in Morocco" marks their second collaboration under a four-picture deal with United Artists.  

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

sources.title: Outpost in Morocco (1949)
sources.description: Captain Gerard, greatest lover in the Foreign Legion, is assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and find out what he can about the emir's activities. Gerard enjoys his work with lovely Cara, but arrives to find rebellion brewing. Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/outpost-in-morocco-1949/

sources.title: Outpost in Morocco (1949) Action, Adventure Full Length Movie
sources.description:
After escorting an Emir's daughter to her father's stronghold, French Foreign Legion Captain Gerard's unit joins an isolated Moroccan outpost facing imminent attack by rebel Bedouin tribes.

Director: Robert Florey
Writers: Charles Grayson, Paul de Sainte Colombe 
Stars: George Raft, Marie Windsor, Akim Tamiroff 
Genres: Classics, Action, Adventure  

@CCC

metadata.Plot: Capt. Gerard, greatest lover in the Foreign Legion, is assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and find out what he can about the emir's activities. Gerard enjoys his work with lovely Cara, but arrives to find rebellion brewing. Can the garrison be reinforced in time?
metadata.Writer: Charles Grayson, Paul de Sainte Colombe, Joseph N. Ermolieff
metadata.Actors: George Raft, Marie Windsor, Akim Tamiroff
